sub_title: Business English language coaching for executives & managers | Professional Neurolanguage Coach¬Æ | Providing you with confidence to work in English | Be better at English at work | Learn effectively & efficiently
summary:
I coach business professionals in English so that they feel both üåüconfidentüåü and competent to work in English. I can help you develop your business English communication skills for any business situation. Using Neurolanguage Coaching¬Æ, learning becomes time and cost efficient as well as effective due to personal goal setting.

üì© Are you interested in knowing more? DM me to book a free initial session!

What do I do?

By understanding how the brain learns best (neuroscience), as Neurolanguage Coach¬Æ, I can make sure that:
‚ô¶ You are in the optimal mind state to facilitate learning. This means that you feel comfortable when using English. 
‚ô¶ Within no time, you feel confident and are ready to tackle your work in English. 

What does a neurolanguage coach¬Æ do?

As a neurolanguage coach¬Æ, I know that: 
‚ô¶ each brain is unique.
‚ô¶ we all learn differently
‚ô¶ we all need to feel comfortable to learn. 
So, I create a calm, welcoming and professional atmosphere that allows optional learning. This atmosphere releases the right chemicals into your brain to help this. I also use knowledge of learning preferences to improve your learning. If you have always thought ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt learn anymore‚Äù or have a bad learning experience, I can help you work through this. Most importantly, I know that your brain is capable of amazing things ‚Äì you can always learn because of your brain‚Äôs plasticity. I work with business professionals in the Netherlands (offline) and online with the world community to help them achieve their language learning goals.

How does this process work?

‚ô¶ Using an initial free meeting, we set out your personalised learning road map with realistic goals. 
‚ô¶ You set the goals, the time-line and the tempo; we work together towards efficient and effective achievement of your goals. 
‚ô¶ We can check and ensure your progress by setting realistic goals at the beginning, performing a goal review mid-programme and at the end.

Who am I?

Hi, my name is Tara and I am an experienced business English trainer and a Professional Neurolanguage Coach¬Æ certified and accredited by the International Coaching Federation. 
I have been running my language business for more than 10 years and have been teaching business English for more than 20 years in South Korea, Hong Kong, France, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. 

To sum up, Making English YourEnglish - Neurolanguage Coaching¬Æ is brain-friendly language learning that combines the strengths of teaching and coaching to empower language learners to achieve their Business English goals efficiently and effectively.
